item.title: Orchard Management and Landscape Context Mediate the Pear Floral Microbiome
Interactions between plants and pollinators across urban and rural farming landscapes
The Global Lake Area, Climate, and Population Dataset: A New Tool for Addressing Critical Limnological Questions
item.description: This bulletin piece describes potential applications for the Global Lake area, Climate, and Population (GLCP) dataset. We use three case studies to show different uses for the GLCP at local, regional, and national scales.

item.title: Integrating Perspectives to Understand Lake Ice Dynamics in a Changing World
item.description: This study describes drivers of freshwater lake ice, methods for the study of lake ice, and avenues for multidisciplinary research to fill existing gaps in this body of research.

item.title: Plant-Pollinator Interactions in a Northwest Arum Related to Plant Traits but not Riparian Forest Management
item.description: This paper discusses plant-pollinator interactions on Lysichiton americanus in a western Washington (USA) riparian forest.
